name: aismr
title: AISMR - Surreal Object Videos
description: 8-second micro-films of everyday objects with impossible modifiers. Tactile, mesmerizing, slightly unsettling.

guardrails.summary: Strict timing, visual, audio, and style constraints for AISMR production
guardrails.onscreen_text_policy: Non-diegetic on-screen text must be added via Shotstack overlays; do not bake into kie.ai renders.
